item.description:
Watch Buster Keaton's hilarious attempts to save his sweetheart and his train in this silent movie classic with live music by The Alloy Orchestra. I've seen this before and it is a hoot! I'd recommend buying tickets in advance because these silent films with music by The Alloy Orchestra tend to sell out. You can purchase tickets here: http://www.icaboston....

Here is what the AllMovie Guide has to say in their 5 Star review:
http://www.allmovie.c...

Here is the link to the Alloy Orchestra's website:
http://www.alloyorche...

Directions to the ICA: http://www.icaboston....

I've heard that the cafe at ICA should be a good place for us to go afterwards, but if you know of another place nearby, let me know.

As always, look for Tom holding a meetup sign near the front row after the movie.
Tickets are $15.
item.name: "The General": Great Comedy and Great Music!
